meanings.definition: A split or division in something, especially a rock or the ground.
meanings.sent1: The clefting in the mountain showed its age.
meanings.sent2: The earthquake caused a clefting in the ground.
meanings.sent3: The clefting in the sidewalk made it tricky to walk straight.
meanings.sent4: The clefting in their friendship seemed impossible to mend.
meanings.sent5: The clefting in the tree trunk revealed its inner strength.

meanings.definition: The act of splitting or dividing something.
meanings.sent1: His clefting of the wood was precise.
meanings.sent2: The clefting of the cake was messy but fun.
meanings.sent3: The clefting of the group caused chaos.
meanings.sent4: Her clefting of the argument left everyone speechless.
meanings.sent5: The clefting of the paper created a jagged edge.

meanings.definition: A surgical procedure to correct a cleft lip or palate.
meanings.sent2: Clefting procedures have advanced over the years.
meanings.sent4: Her smile after the clefting surgery was heartwarming.
meanings.sent5: The clefting repair changed his life for the better.
